about_the_game:
Reno is a mischievous inter-dimensional smuggler who bends time and space at will with a device on their wrist. Reno becomes the prime suspect in a time-space terrorism case and the Alternate Reality Police Department (ARPD) bring them in for questioning.
Reno insists that they had nothing to do with any of these events and escapes from their cell. During the getaway the device becomes damaged, plunging Reno into another reality and an inter-dimensional manhunt! With the ARPD hot on Reno's back and little resources, the race is on to clear their name!

Features:

  • Travel through different realities in procedurally generated level layouts
  • Access an arsenal of weapons from across the multiverse
  • Test your skills in Endless Mode! See how far you can get when every level gets harder!

With the ARPD hot on Reno's back and little resources, the race is on to clear their name!

name: Into the Infinite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Play as Reno, a mischievous inter-dimensional smuggler trying to clear their name! Travel between realities in this third-person action game as you fight with an array of weapons from across the multiverse. Every playthrough is different with procedural layouts and tiers of random weapons!
